Title: Only Judy Can Judge
Plot: Nancy plans a family dinner while tending to her pot business. Andy and Jill agree to watch over Stevie throughout the day. Silas befriends a local pot grower, while Shane invites Angela, his classmate, over for family dinner. Back at the house, Doug makes enemies with the neighbour's dog.
ParentalRatingReason: R16 Sex scenes,violence,drug use and offensive language
